class.name: TextureCubemapArrayRD
class.brief_description: Texture Array for Cubemaps that is bound to a texture created on the [RenderingDevice].
class.description: This texture class allows you to use a cubemap array texture created directly on the [RenderingDevice] as a texture for materials, meshes, etc. [b]Note:[/b] [TextureCubemapArrayRD] is intended for low-level usage with [RenderingDevice]. For most use cases, use [CubemapArray] instead.
